CustomField.description: Minimum require Badge Count is stored in Custom Setting "TH Min Ranger Badge Count"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If not set and a contact has >= min required badge count, notify their manager they are a potential ranger. Notifications need the notify Manager setting to be TRUE and a Manager being recorded on the Contact record. No post made if Honorary Ranger=TRUE
CustomField.label: Manager Notified - Potential Ranger
